headline: France Data Center Colocation Analysis Report 2025: Market to Expand by Almost $2.5 Billion by 2030, Driven by AI Demand, Sustainability, Cloud Connectivity, Enhanced Submarine Cable Infrastructure
summary: The France Data Center Colocation Market is set to grow from USD 1.09 billion in 2024 to USD 3.57 billion by 2030, boasting a CAGR of 21.86%. This expansion is driven by increased investments, such as Equinix's USD 361 million PA13x facility in Paris. The focus is on AI-ready data centers, exemplified by a joint venture between Bpifrance, MGX, Mistral AI, and NVIDIA, planning a 1,400 MW campus. Market insights cover colocation supply, demand, revenue, and trends. The report also includes a compe

headline: Portugal Data Center Colocation Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025: Market to Grow at a CAGR of 26.73% During 2024-2030 - Key Players Include Start Campus, Equinix
summary: The Portugal data center colocation market is set for remarkable growth, with a projected CAGR of 26.73% from 2024 to 2030. As of December 2024, Portugal boasts 17 operational colocation data centers, with increasing numbers anticipated due to investment influx. Lisbon remains a pivotal hub, home to 5 current and 11 planned data centers. The industry report covers comprehensive insights on colocation demand and supply, existing and future market landscapes, as well as the impact of AI, sustainab
